      class  HadoopReduceCombineFunction<KEYIN extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,VALUEIN extends Writable,KEYOUT extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,VALUEOUT extends Writable>
      This wrapper maps a Hadoop Reducer and Combiner (mapred API) to a combinable Flink GroupReduceFunction.
      class  HadoopReduceFunction<KEYIN extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,VALUEIN extends Writable,KEYOUT extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,VALUEOUT extends Writable>
      This wrapper maps a Hadoop Reducer (mapred API) to a non-combinable Flink GroupReduceFunction.
